name: Blue Shinigami
description:
Blue Shinigami 

A  survival , arena shooter , bullet_hell game where you control a little shinigami trying to master his skills .

Use a variety of ranged and melee weapons to take out different kinds of enemies 

and try to survive as much as you can .

It's a simple game but still has fun in it .

UPDATE :

The game is updated , Many bugs where fixed and the melee weapons effects has been changed a little .
